definition: To reside or dwell in a particular place, typically referring to the act of living in a permanent or temporary location. This word is commonly used to describe the action of inhabiting a house, apartment, or any other type of living space.

examples.german: Sie wohnen in einem gro√üen Haus.
examples.english: They live in a big house.

examples.german: Meine Eltern wohnen auf dem Land.
examples.english: My parents live in the countryside.
